privacy_policy.sub_details: Please go through the Privacy Policy
main_content: This Privacy Policy applies to https://www.glowingbud.com .

glowingbud.com recognizes the importance of maintaining your privacy. We value your privacy and appreciate your trust in us. This Policy describes how we treat user information we collect on https://www.glowingbud.com its affiliates and other offline sources. This Privacy Policy applies to current and former visitors to our website and to our online customers.

This Policy applies to the personal information we process related to Internet sites (“Internet Site”) and mobile applications (“App”) operated by or on behalf of Glowing Bud and the services, we provide through an Internet Site and App, that display or include a link to this Policy (collectively the “Services”).

It also applies to personal information Glowing Bud may otherwise collect: (i) through our products and services; (ii) when you interact with us by means other than a Glowing Bud Internet Site or App, for example, in person, by telephone, or at a trade show or training; and (iii) from our former and prospective customers, distributors, and other business partners (collectively “Business Partners”) as well as our suppliers and vendors.

By visiting and/or using our website, you agree to this Privacy Policy. glowingbud.com is a property of Glowing Bud LLC, a Company registered in Wyoming, US in 2022, Under registered agent identity FBRA LLC, with its registered address as 1603 Capitol Ave Ste 413A No 2932 Cheyenne, WY 82001, established under Wyoming Limited Liability Company Act, (W.S. 17-29-101 through17-29-1105) and Registered Offices and Agents Act (W.S. 17-28-101 through 17-28-111).

The Data We Collect: We collect information directly from individuals, from third parties, our subsidiary websites and automatically through the Glowingbud Platform. This legal document is generated on terms outlined in Personal Privacy in an Information Society (1977) under the PRIVACY ACT OF 1974.

This legal document is in the context of an agreement with the necessities of Rule 4 of the Information Technology that require publication of the privacy policy for access or usage of www.glowingbud.com (“Glowing bud” or “website”).

This privacy policy applies to all users and subscribers of our websites. By using Glowingbud.com, or completing the contact us registration process through offline mode, you will be agreeing and acknowledging that you have carefully read this privacy policy and accepted this agreement.
References in these Terms to “we” or “us” or “website” or “company” or “Glowing Bud” are references to www.glowingbud.com and “you” as subscribers/users of a website.

Privacy Foreword: While providing information for numerous web expansion services, the subject of online privacy is tremendously crucial for Glowing Bud, and hence, we are committed to protecting the information provided by its users. We are devoted to creating a sensibly secure environment for our users.

e_sim.sub_heading_1: How easy is it to use an eSim?

main_content.heading: Select a Destination
main_content.sub_heading: Choose a country where you would like to purchase and use your eSIM

main_content.heading: Choose a Plan
main_content.sub_heading: Choose a plan which suits you the best, and purchase it!

main_content.heading: QR Scan
main_content.sub_heading: Use the QR Code to scan and setup your eSIM on your device!

main_content.heading: Enjoy!
main_content.sub_heading: After installation, your plan will be activated and you can  see the plan status right on your homescreen, you can stay connected anywhere in the world right  now!

main_content.heading: We are available
main_content.sub_heading: Download our app from Google Play Store or Apple App Store

destinations.title: Popular<br class='d-sm-none'> Destinations
destinations.sub_details: View the most popular destinations where we have helped customers stay connected the most!

testimonials.sub_details_1: For the first time in my life, I didn’t have to worry about going through the hassle of getting a new sim card in a different country. everything was in the palm of my hands, and the MyBud app has helped me stay connected with my close ones even when I was miles apart from them.

reward_points.rewards_max_error: You cannot redeem more than {{ maxPoint }} reward points
reward_points.reward_usage_limit_error: You cannot redeem points more than plan price

my_reward.title: My Reward Points
my_reward.heading: Reward Points
my_reward.get_referral_note: Your referral code will be available after first purchase is made.
my_reward.referral_note: Share this with friends and family to get {{ referralReward }} reward points. <br class='d-none d-md-block d-lg-none'>(Reward points will be credited to your account once other person makes 1st purchase)

installation.manual_instructions: Follow the given steps below carefully to install your eSIM Manually.
installation.qr_instructions: Follow the given steps below carefully to install your eSIM with the QR Code Provided.
installation.selection_message: You can either select the QR Code method or the Manual Method.
installation.selection_details: Each method has a different set of instructions for you to follow to be able to install your eSIM with ease.

qr_steps: Scan the QR code using the camera function on the device

Follow the on-screen installation instruction on the device screen and
  • Select a name for your eSIM
  • Select GlowingBud to be your primary service of data (can be changed in settings later).
For international use, disable cellular data switching
Enable data roaming in your settings menu
Activate your plan, in your plans page
manual_steps: Settings - Cellular/Mobile Data - Add Data Plan - QR Code - Enter Details Manually
Manually enter, or copy and paste the SM-DP-Address and Activation code provided above

Follow the on-screen installation instruction on the device screen and
  • Select a name for your eSIM
  • Select GlowingBud to be your primary service of data (can be changed in settings later).
Enable data roaming in your settings menu
Activate your plan, in your plans page

qr_steps: Scan the QR code using the camera function on the device

Follow the on-screen installation instruction on the device screen and
  • Turn on your new eSIM
  • The name can be changed from the edit button on the top right corner.
Turn ON Roaming from your eSIM settings page
Activate your plan, in your plans page
manual_steps:
Settings - Network & Internet - Add SIM
  • Select the QR option in settings to get the manual option
  • Select “Need help?” and you will get an “enter it manually” option
Manually enter, or copy and paste the activation details

Follow the on-screen installation instruction on the device screen and
  • Turn on your new eSIM
  • The name can be changed from the edit button on the top right corner.
Turn ON Roaming from your eSIM settings page
Activate your plan, in your plans page

installation.manual_activate_plan: You can activate this plan whenever you would like in the next 90 days in your account under “My Plans”.
installation.activate_one_plan_message: If you activate this plan while another plan is active, your current plan will be cancelled, as you can only have one active plan at a time.
